list.abs: the traditional way of starting the Shonton Festival is to show Buddha paintings . the main contents include Tibetan operas and gala parties , as well as wonderful yak racing and horsemanship display .传统的雪顿节以展佛为序幕，以演藏戏、看藏戏、过林卡为主要内容，同时还有精彩的赛耗牛和马术表演等。
a sport that tests horsemanship ., 测试马术的一种运动.
riding horses across over obstructions to demonstrate horsemanship ., 骑马穿过障碍物来证明骑马术.
classical horsemanship seems to have endured in Portugal without many modifications .古典马术似乎没有在葡萄牙经历许多修改。

entry.def: Horsemanship is the ability to ride horses well.

means.word_mean: 1. skill in handling and riding horses

auth_sentence.content: Famed for his horsemanship and patient riding style, the prematurely grey-haired jockey makes sitting still look an art form.
auth_sentence.res_content: Famed for his horsemanship and patient riding style, the prematurely grey-haired jockey makes sitting still look an art form.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词,表示"某种技能"; 2. 表名词,表示"某种关系,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: airman飞行员,空军+ship某种技能→n.飞行术,导航技术
horseman养马的人,骑师,马兵+ship某种技能→n.马术

stems_affixes.value_cn: 推销术,说服力,销售,推销
stems_affixes.word_buile: salsman推销员+ship某种技能→n.推销术,说服力,销售,推销
champion冠军+ship某种关系,状态→n.锦标赛;冠军赛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen公民+ship某种关系,状态→n.市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
dictator专政者+ship某种关系,状态→n.独裁[权];专政
friend朋友+ship某种关系,状态→n.友谊,友好
hard艰难的+ship某种关系,状态→n.艰难,困苦
member成员+ship某种关系,状态→n.会员资格,成员资格
partner合作者+ship某种关系,状态→n.合伙企业
relation关系,联系+ship某种关系,状态→n.关系,联系
